com.camerontec.catalys.server.task

Class TaskBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.util.configuration.AbstractConfigurable
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ComponentHelper
        • com.camerontec.catalys.server.component.ExposableMBeanComponent
          • com.camerontec.catalys.server.schedule.Task
            • com.camerontec.catalys.server.task.TaskBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IComponent, IHasAttributes, IConfigurable, IRegisterable, ITask, Cloneable, Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompactTask, PartyTaskBase, ShutdownTask

    public abstract class TaskBase
extends Task
    This adds the following to the standard Scheduled implementation Task:
    • Locates the configuration object.
    • Adds a properties string which uniquely defines the instance using the class name and any other attributes the object has.
    • Implements the Runnable run method with an overridable doTask.
    • toString which returns properties string

    It inherits the standard Domain suffix.

    Subclasses will normally override getDomainPrefix.

      • getPropertiesString

        public String getPropertiesString()
        This defines a particular instance within the domain and must be unique. Default implementation gives class name plus any properties (excluding 'class' if present).
        Specified by:
        getPropertiesString in class ExposableMBeanComponent
        Returns:
        Unique string in standard JMS property=value form.
